response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which is valued at $8,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $7,200. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure a high-value item at a discounted rate. I look forward to hearing your response soon. Best regards, Alice", "product_price": 7200}
